text: Raphael Ravenscroft (4 June 1954 â€“ 19 October 2014) was a British musician, composer and author. He was known for playing the saxophone. Ravenscroft was known for performing in Gerry Rafferty's first song "Baker Street". Ravenscroft died on 19 October 2014 at a hospital in Exeter, England from a suspected heart attack, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:British rock musicians Category:British saxophonists Category:British writers Category:People from Dumfries Category:20th-century British composers Category:21st-century British composers
